categories.title: ElizaOS Development Updates and Plugin Contributions

content.text:
### Web3 Narrative Marketing Automation
- [shivam_18795] is developing an automation platform using Langchain and Eliza OS Brain.
- Features include draft editing, scheduled posting, automated replies, and performance feedback loops.
- Seeking early testers for feedback and improvements.

### Token Prediction Plugin
- [dorianjanezic] built a token prediction plugin with a feedback loop: data → prediction → checks → evaluation → summary.
- Looking to integrate reinforcement learning for improved accuracy.
- Shared GitHub repo: [plugin-token-prediction](https://github.com/dorianjanezic/eliza/tree/komo-main/packages/plugin-token-prediction).
- Example prediction showed MAPE (Mean Absolute Percentage Error) calculations and market behavior analysis.

### Tech-Support Bot on ElizaOS
- [chris.troutner] is developing an open-source tech-support bot using ElizaOS.
- Focuses on JavaScript, Bitcoin, and GitHub repositories.
- Running local AI models on a Linux desktop with NVIDIA GeForce 3060 (12GB VRAM).
- Clients: Telegram and Nostr (censorship-resistant alternative to Twitter/Discord).
- Seeking collaboration on a Nostr plugin for ElizaOS.

### AI Agent Platform
- [dtb0x] launched Aigent.sh, an AI agent platform powered by ElizaOS.
- Goal: Make AI agents accessible to non-technical users.
- Rolling out daily updates and open to feedback.

### Plugin Contributions
- **Mem0 AI SDK Provider PR**: [whysosaket] submitted a PR to add Mem0 as a provider in the Vercel AI SDK, introducing a memory layer for users. ([PR #3927](https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/pull/3927))
- **DexPaprika Plugin PR**: [0xmattsroka] submitted a PR for a plugin that fetches on-chain token prices across 20+ chains, powered by the DexPaprika team. ([PR #109](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/109))
- **Twitter Plugin PR**: [tadeuchi] submitted a PR for a Twitter plugin that fetches post data back to the calling client. ([PR #108](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/108))
- **Distributed Storage Plugin PR**: [fforbeck] submitted a PR to add a distributed storage plugin to Eliza's Plugin Registry. ([PR #111](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/111))

### Issues and Questions
- **Broken Link Issue**: [flaneurofmetaverses] reported a broken link for a plugin in the registry. [odilitime] inquired for clarification.
- **Versioning Question**: [hish1639] asked about the version in which their merged PR would be included but did not receive a response.

### Custom Plugin Development and Installation
- Users discussed installing custom plugins in ElizaOS, recommending starting from the stable or develop branch.
- `asi123aa` is developing a plugin for fetching data and generating trading signals, focusing on user intent extraction and response accuracy.
- `shivam_18795` is integrating Langchain with ElizaOS for Web3 narrative marketing automation and seeking early testers.

### Memory System and Knowledge Retention
- A developer is actively improving ElizaOS’s memory system.
- `newbx0_02229` reported issues with Eliza forgetting past conversations and failing to use added knowledge effectively. `rick02533` suggested setting `ragKnowledge=false` for string arrays to improve retention.

### Multi-Agent and Multi-Language Support
- Users explored running multiple agents independently, focusing on separate environments and API key management.
- Some plugins contain hardcoded English elements, requiring updates for full multi-language support.

### Twitter Bot and Plugin Issues
- A user faced shadowbanning due to missing the 'automated' account setting. Solution: restart with a clean account and ensure proper settings.
- `sherlock0x` and `ad_dev` reported issues with `client-twitter` in v2, which remains unresolved.
- `tadeuchi` submitted a PR for a Twitter plugin that fetches post data back to the calling client.

### Docker and Installation Issues
- Users faced authentication errors when running ElizaOS in Docker. Solution: check environment variables and use `doctor inspect`.
- `4n7m4n` encountered installation errors due to missing `@elizaos/plugin-sql@^0.25.6`.
- SQLite module errors were resolved by forcing a reinstall of `better-sqlite3`.

### AI Model and Crypto Data Integration
- `chris.troutner` is integrating locally hosted LLMs (e.g., Ollama) with ElizaOS using `plugin-local-ai`.
- `nb1121` discussed feeding real-time DeFi/crypto data into ElizaOS for automated tweets. `behnammby` suggested a three-step approach: data collection, provider integration, and action definition.

### Plugin and Feature Development
- `freytes` took over maintenance of `plugin-rabbi-trader`, and `odilitime` unarchived it.
- `0xmattsroka` submitted a PR for a DexPaprika plugin to fetch on-chain token prices across 20+ chains.
- `fforbeck` submitted a PR for a distributed storage plugin.
- `whysosaket` submitted a PR to add Mem0 as a provider in the Vercel AI SDK, introducing a memory layer.

### Documentation and API Improvements
- Swagger API documentation was abandoned due to complexity; a simpler REST API documentation page was created instead.
- `dankvr` pointed out missing plugin versions in the registry and linked the registry JSON.
- `rick02533` and `dankvr` are working on improving CLI and registry documentation.
